update-eslint-builder-and-config.description: Migrate to the new ESLint builder and ESLint config style

add-json-ext-to-eslintrc.description: Add explicit .json file extension to .eslintrc files, not using an extension is deprecated

add-root-eslintrc-json-to-workspace-impl.description: Update implicitDependencies within nx.json to include root .eslintrc.json

revert-node-modules-files-in-eslint-buil.description: Revert any node_modules lintFilesPatterns that were accidentally included by update-eslint-builder-and-config

update-eslint-configs-to-use-nx-presets.description: Update ESLint config files to use preset configs which eslint-plugin-nx exports

update-root-eslint-config-to-use-overrid.description: Update root ESLint config to use overrides

always-use-project-level-tsconfigs-with-.description: Update project .eslintrc.json files to always use project level tsconfigs
